thumb.title: [TAS] NES 悪魔城ドラキュラ "サブウェポン無し、ノーダメージ" by scrimpeh in 13:18.44
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SEu0zLYV5rw以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6630M TAS originally published on 2025-07-12Castlevania is an action platformer released in 1986 by Konami. Set in the year 1691, Simon Belmont must fight his way through the castle and destroy Count Dracula. As an added challenge, scrimpeh (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/scrimpeh) beats the game without using subweapons or taking damage.
thumb.last_res_body: もしかしてホネイ... 途中で絶対に無理... 人生後ろ向き 終 カメラのもうちょ... 聖水「取れよ」ボ...
